reviewText:
Some insights into snippets of the history of radio.
There are several tracks that I would categorize as military propaganda or infomercials for
for businesses. Some seem rather "staged."
Interesting.

Content is interesting but not polished - transferred from original (old) source material with varying quality.  This is for the history buff, not the casual viewer.  Having said that, I am satisfied with it - but maybe not everybody would be.
